title: needcreations
author: needcreations
content: Hey, all! I'm back with a 3rd Limited Edition of my PLEB Cards.- 54 unique Bitcoin education cards! 👨‍🎓- Only 100 Limited 3rd Edition decks were made 💎- Great orange pilling tool 💊- They're selling fast!- Discount for paying in sats ⚡- Fast worldwide shipping 🌎Here's a post with some pictures of my cards: https://twitter.com/NEEDcreations/status/1659856649689890818?s=20You can also buy the 2nd Edition from Amazon or Ebay with fiat.Amazon: https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0BSHD7G9X?ref=myi_title_dpEbay: https://www.ebay.com/itm/266054608846
